name: Stay Warm Jam
description:
Submission for GDA January Jam - Theme - Stay Warm

I went for an atmospheric sort of experience, so I'll be honest its kind of low on "gameplay" really. This is my make-up horror game since I didn't do one for October. :D

I used this project as a test/learning for different kinds of tools that I hadn't really used too much before in Unity.

A few things I would have liked to improve/fix; the UI like usual, not my best skill. Some animations were kinda unfinished and I want to add a few more. Would liked to have added some cool interactable stuff in the map, it's kinda empty as is.
